replies.body: Hmmmmm,100$.
replies.body_tagged: Hmmmmm,100$.

replies.body:
Cheapest to most expensive

Good - Gtx 770 - Maxes out most games on ultra @ 1080p
Better - gtx 780 - Good for higher resolution gaming
Best - gtx 780ti - Better for higher resolution gaming

If you're gaming at 1080p, the gtx 770 is for you.
And then in the future you have the option to upgrade.

EDIT: oopssss the gtx 770 is 300$ :c

Ehmm 100$ is a bit low for good performance

Only card I can think of is gtx 750ti@ 150$

Tip: Get the gtx 760 @ 240$ / gtx 770 if you got the spare cash.
replies.body_tagged:
Cheapest to most expensive

Best - gtx 780ti - Better for higher resolution gaming

If you're gaming at 1080p, the gtx 770 is for you.
And then in the future you have the option to upgrade.
